amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection of Persons and Property
amendatorysection.catchline: Power to contract: Presently exercisable power of appointment.
amendatorysection.para: A powerholder of a presently exercisable power of appointment may contract:
(1) not to exercise the power; or
(2) to exercise the power if the contract when made does not confer a benefit on an impermissible appointee.
